circle.$description: avatar.borderRadius.circle — Circular avatar (full radius). DEFAULT shape. Use for: user photos, profile images.

rounded.$description: avatar.borderRadius.rounded — Rounded square avatar. Use for: workspace icons, team logos, entity avatars.

borderWidth.$description: avatar.borderWidth — Avatar border width (1px). Subtle border separates avatar from background. Applied when avatar needs visual boundary.

lg.$description: avatar.fontSize.lg — Initials font size for lg avatar (20px).

md.$description: avatar.fontSize.md — Initials font size for md avatar (16px). DEFAULT.

sm.$description: avatar.fontSize.sm — Initials font size for sm avatar (12px).

xl.$description: avatar.fontSize.xl — Initials font size for xl avatar (24px).

xs.$description: avatar.fontSize.xs — Initials font size for xs avatar (10px). Compact but readable single or dual character.

fontWeight.$description: avatar.fontWeight — Initials font weight. Medium weight ensures initials are legible at small sizes without being overly bold.

ring.$description: avatar.group.ring — Ring border width around each avatar in a group (2px). Creates visual separation between overlapping avatars.

lg.$description: avatar.size.lg — Large avatar (56px). Use for: profile headers, featured users, team pages.

md.$description: avatar.size.md — Medium avatar (40px). DEFAULT size. Use for: list items, cards, standard user displays.

sm.$description: avatar.size.sm — Small avatar (32px). Use for: comment threads, chat messages, navigation items.

xl.$description: avatar.size.xl — Extra large avatar (64px). Use for: profile pages, hero sections, prominent user displays.

xs.$description: avatar.size.xs — Extra small avatar (24px). Use for: inline mentions, compact lists, dense data tables.

borderWidth.$description: avatar.status.borderWidth — Ring around the status indicator dot (1px). Separates dot from avatar image for visual clarity.

lg.$description: avatar.status.size.lg — Status dot for lg avatar (12px).

md.$description: avatar.status.size.md — Status dot for md avatar (10px).

sm.$description: avatar.status.size.sm — Status dot for sm avatar (8px).

xl.$description: avatar.status.size.xl — Status dot for xl avatar (14px).

xs.$description: avatar.status.size.xs — Status dot for xs avatar (6px).
